name: Kenice Mobley
bio: Kenice performs stand up comedy around the country and recently participated in the Women in Comedy Festival, the Boston Comedy Festival, and the Outside the Box Festival. She recently appeared on WGBH discussing comedy and politics and will be featured in the upcoming season of Laughs on FOX. She has opened for W. Kamau Bell at the Wilbur Theater and was named Comic in Residence (November 2016) for the Comedy Studio in Harvard Square. She currently hosts Person About Town, an interview and relationship podcast. Her jokes usually center around dating, race and her eccentric Southern family; her mother is very proud.
